verbs.description: The sun [V: was] setting , dinner was waiting and President Donald Trump was making the short walk to his private residence when , on March 8 , he suddenly made a detour to the press briefing room .

[ARG1: The sun] was [V: setting] , dinner was waiting and President Donald Trump was making the short walk to his private residence when , on March 8 , he suddenly made a detour to the press briefing room .
The sun was setting , dinner [V: was] waiting and President Donald Trump was making the short walk to his private residence when , on March 8 , he suddenly made a detour to the press briefing room .

The sun was setting , [ARG1: dinner] was [V: waiting] and President Donald Trump was making the short walk to his private residence when , on March 8 , he suddenly made a detour to the press briefing room .
The sun was setting , dinner was waiting and President Donald Trump [V: was] making the short walk to his private residence when , on March 8 , he suddenly made a detour to the press briefing room .

The sun was setting , dinner was waiting and [ARG0: President Donald Trump] was [V: making] [ARG1: the short walk to his private residence] [ARGM-TMP: when , on March 8 , he suddenly made a detour to the press briefing room] .

The sun was setting , dinner was waiting and President Donald Trump was making the short walk to his private residence [ARGM-TMP: when] , [ARGM-TMP: on March 8] , [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MNR: suddenly] [V: made] [ARG1: a detour to the press briefing room] .
